name: Corrupt (itch) (Shadow Interactive)
description:
Corrupt is a 2D Stealth Platformer in which the player has no kill/incapacitate options. The player must find a way through the levels without killing any guards, so that they can retrieve the corrupted funds from the treasure room.

This game is a product of Shadow Interactive, 2017.

Credits:
Christopher Bull
Matthew Holt (dovahcooper.itch.io)
Sebastian Dipietro
Jake Hardy
Thomas Meadus
